message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you at $1500000. I am offering this extraordinary opportunity to you at a special price of $1250000. This is an exceptional deal considering the product's worth and the benefits it offers. I believe this price aligns well with its value and presents a unique chance for you to secure it. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know. I look forward to your positive response.
